Provides CRUD and fetch operations for Resource objects.

public java.util.LinkedHashMap<Resource,java.lang.Number> getMostPopularResources(int maxNumResources)
                                                                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Specified by:
getMostPopularResources in interface IResourceDAO
Returns:
Returns the N most frequently requested Resources of all time, mapped to a count of requests.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if maxNumResources is less than 1.

getMostPopularResources

public java.util.LinkedHashMap<Resource,java.lang.Number> getMostPopularResources(int maxNumResources,
                                                                                  int lastNDays)
                                                                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Specified by:
getMostPopularResources in interface IResourceDAO
Returns:
Returns the N most frequently requested Resources, considering the last N days, mapped to a count of requests.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if maxNumResources is less than 1 or if lastNDays is less than 1.

getMostPopularResources

public java.util.LinkedHashMap<Resource,java.lang.Number> getMostPopularResources(int maxNumResources,
                                                                                  java.util.Date since)
                                                                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Specified by:
getMostPopularResources in interface IResourceDAO
since - If null, query will consider all ResourceRequests.
Returns:
Returns the N most frequently requested Resources, considering the period of time between the since date parameter and now, mapped to a count of requests.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if maxNumResources is less than 1 or if since date is not null and after the current date.

getSlowestResources

public java.util.LinkedHashMap<Resource,java.lang.Number> getSlowestResources(int maxNumResources)
                                                                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Specified by:
getSlowestResources in interface IResourceDAO
Returns:
Returns a map of the N most frequently requested Resources of all time to the average ResourceRequest service time for each Resource.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if maxNumResources is less than 1.
